spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Flimp is a 14th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). Flimp has the following artificer spells prepared:

trait.name: Infused Magical Items
entries: Flimp is wearing a {@item cloak of the manta ray}, a {@item ring of protection}, {@item +2 plate armor||plate armor +2}, and {@item winged boots}. Flimp wields a {@item +2 warhammer||warhammer +2}. These items vanish 4 days after Flimp dies.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Flimp has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma Saving Throws against magic.

trait.name: Battle Smith
entries: Flimp uses his Intelligence modifier for attack and damage rolls with his weapons.

action.name: Warhammer, +2
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) force damage.

action.name: Summon Steel Defender (1/Day)
entries: Flimp summons a {@creature Steel Defender|TCE|metallic panther} to aid him in combat. The panther has maximum hit points (24) and is immune to poison and being {@condition charmed}.

reaction.name: Flash of Genius
entries: When Flimp or another creature he can see within 30 feet of him makes an ability check or a saving throw, Flimp can use his reaction to add +4 to the roll.
